comments.comments_text: GOAL! The corner is whipped in and Alfonso Pedraza (Villarreal) is in the right place at the right time, planting his header straight into the bottom right corner. He makes it 0:1.

comments.comments_text: The defence had a hard time blocking out the strike from Unai Lopez (Rayo Vallecano). He didn't hesitate and finished from outside the box right after he had received a pass from his teammate.

comments.comments_text: Sergio Guardiola (Rayo Vallecano) makes a great solo run and pulls the trigger from inside the box, beating Geronimo Rulli with a strike into the bottom left corner. He makes it 1:1.
